options.name: Free Action : Arcanist Charge
options.description: You can charge Spells at the expense of your mind. Whenever you use this ability, you take Psychic Damage equal to 1d4 per Power cost of the Spell.

options.name: Reaction : Empower Ally
options.description: When another Creature within 10 Units that you can see Channels a Spell, you can Charge it by spending 2 Focus Points.

options.name: Reaction : Prepared Spell
options.description: At the start of Combat, you can Channel a Spell that takes one Action before Initiative Order starts.

options.name: Action : Mind Challenge
options.description: You utilize your Focus to make a Contested Arcanum Check against a Creature with the loser of the Check becoming Dazed. While you Focus on this ability, the Target has a 1d4 Penalty to Resistance and Concentration Checks. This does not work on Creatures who are not capable of making an Arcanum Check.
